biotools.summary: A tool especially designed to search for putative interactions between a H/ACA snoRNA stem and a list of target sequence. It implements a dynamic programming algorithm that computes thermodynamically optimal H/ACA-RNA interactions in an efficient scanning variant.

bioschemas.name: RNAsnoop
bioschemas.summary: A tool especially designed to search for putative interactions between a H/ACA snoRNA stem and a list of target sequence. It implements a dynamic programming algorithm that computes thermodynamically optimal H/ACA-RNA interactions in an efficient scanning variant.
